1.0.3.en: Initial release: ESPHome ventilation control with auto-detection for modern and legacy API versions

1.0.5.en: Improved app description, README, and images for App Store compliance.

1.1.0.en: Added Open AIR Valve device support with position control, flow actions, and re-homing. Added fan speed measurement capability. Fixed French translations.
